Poisson

Is poisson space with 4 local maximum and one global maksimum. First, the algorithm samples space and save points in looked array. Algorithm start looking for the maximum from the best place. Heuristic algorithm try find the best source, when it hits the local maximum then it starts again climbing from another best point.

Settings:

Iteration: 0
